name: LimBall
summary:
Limball Game By ASW Studio for Windows Store !

What could be in a mystery book?

The little boy starts reading the LimBall book he found in the library.

As he reads the adventures of LimBall, this incarnation protagonist is drawn into the book.

Can you help LimBall reach his goal in this unusual and fun adventure?

Unlock all levels! Share with your friends
